Hey Hans, can you do me a favor and take a look in C:\Aperi\reports\test3 and see if anything is in there?

Hi Dave,
   C:\Aperi\reports\test3 is not empty but BIRT report viewer should not give me the option to delete it when I right-click the test3 directory.
User should not load any xx.rptdesign files into <Aperi-dir>\reports\ folder manually, it should be done through 'upload' using BIRT viewer GUI
